work

project.
- Projects in Dirox company:
 + Dirox presentation app (Tablet): 
  - Create left side menu, each tab is a fragment.
  - Intent and passing data between activity and fragment
  - Use Retrofit to call data from API service.
  - Create some animation and load image with Glide.
  - Use fluently Linear, Relative,... and Constraint Layout.
  + Unikey app ( about Blockchain):
  - Use design partern MVVM with data binding.
  - Create many layout in app flow.
  - Use gif image.
  + Chairity For Point app:
  - Use MVVM with RxJava.
  - Create login, sign-in, sign up layout,...
  - Use Retrofit2 to call data from API.
  - Take a photo or import from gallery to show in app.
  + Research to learn new library, new feature from
android.
